I'm agnostic with regards to name (although I reserve my right to hate  
whatever you pick as a matter of principle), but I agree that having a  
static @Rule be implicitly a class level rule is too much like voodoo.

Extending the existing pattern gets my vote.

Clive
On 10 Mar 2010, at 04:04, Gary wrote:

> WRT: @RuleOnClass public static ClassRule...
>
> @ClassRule public static ClassRule...
>
> @ClassRule reads better to me than @RuleOnClass
>
> and the symmetry with @Before/@BeforeClass is nice.
>
> Gary
>

-- 
Clive Evans
